website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy little scooter that has more satisfied customers than issues and won't break your budget. An excellent deal.
pros: An updated, affordable intermediate model capable of speeds up to 10 mph
Chain-free motor is easy to maintain
Offers long battery life and a sporty look that kids love
cons: Accelerator button has been known to malfunction
Occasional reports of "lemons" that stop working shortly after purchase

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought the one that last 80 minutes instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 13 year old daughter's birthday per her request. Glad I bought the one that last 80 minutes instead of 40 minutes. Her friends have the 40 minute scooters and wish they had 80. It goes up to 10 mph; that doesn't seem like a lot, but on a scooter it is. I was worried that I wouldn't be able to put it together. This is mostly assembled when you get it and "idiot-proof"; all you have to do is insert that handlebar rod into the base and you're done! Took maybe 5 minutes to do that. Highly recommend! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: as the weather is just now getting nice enough to be outside
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas gift. Our 11 year old son has used this 3 times, as the weather is just now getting nice enough to be outside, and the scooter will no longer charge. Of course, per Razor warranty information, powered scooters are only covered for 90 days. So I guess we will have to take it apart ourselves and hope to fix it. Our son is pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Mad!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old Grandson for Christmas, it was just nice enough here in Minnesota(44 degrees) that he could take it out in the driveway and try it out for the first time, was so excited. Both the cables snapped. Rode for 10 seconds tops, went to turn so did not go past a certain spot in driveway and SNAP! Good luck trying to get anyone in customer service either by phone or on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the same time and two of them stopped working pretty much right away
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these at the same time and two of them stopped working pretty much right away. One of them had a problem with the green button, and the other had a problem with the little motor. I'm not really sure I would recommend these. I only gave it three stars because Amazon stood behind the purchase and replaced them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Gforce5

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this scooter. It took a few minutes to get the hang of kick-starting it, but now they have it mastered and they ride it all the time. Goes for a long time per charge. It's just fast enough to be fun and not so fast I worry about them on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy Dad

customer_reviews.title: He couldn't have been happier on his birthday
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old absolutely loves this!!!! He couldn't have been happier on his birthday!!!! Easy to charge and handle and we love the fact that it runs longer than just 30-40 mins. It was also very easy to put together. Just maje sure you give it the reccomended min amout of time to charge which we did and it runs smooth and great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saskia

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery, heavy product.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Enjoys riding it. The battery has not died once. We do charge it every night to make sure it’s ready for the next day. Downside: the scooter is super heavy, a child would not be able to carry it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just like the first one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas... had to send back and get another cause the power cord didn’t work. Now the one he has does not work as well. He has not been able to ride it due to power cord not charging it.. just like the first one. I will never purchase anything else from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Just received the electric scooter my son has been begging for, I ordered it two day prime so it can get here on the last day of school and before our weekend trip...good news- it came on time- bad news - it won’t charge , the battery came malfunctioned 😫 and it’s too late to get it fixed before our vacation, my son is devastated!!
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: It's ok,
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, very rough ride. But my 6 and 10 year old like it. Its a little much for the 6 year old and its not quite enough for the 10 year old. But the 10 year old isn't ready for something bigger. But we bought another electric scooter for their older siblings which is totally worth the money (see my other reviews). This gets the job done although not elegantly. But for the money its about right.
customer_reviews.author: bharvey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old son for Christmas 2 months ago. Stopped working/charging. RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yeah old loves this scooter. It is plenty fast and goes both up and down hill with ease. It recharges in about an hour and we can get about an hour of run time before noticing it getting slower and needing a recharge. My neighbors kids have the E100 and it is just a little bit faster. But it does have a "adjustable" twist throttle while the E90 just has a button.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful of retailer
customer_reviews.text: received product in unlabeled box. I charged it and the charge light turned green. As soon as the product was in use the motor did not last for more than 5 minutes. I feel like I had gotten a refurbished product. Be careful from buying from this retailer. I will report them to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Omar Mapara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10yr old grandson for Christmas. I did as the instructions read.. charged it for 24hrs. He rode it for about 15 mins before it stopped. We charged it again for another 24hrs.. same thing. Also, sounds like there is a loose part that rattles. I've since returned the scooter. I do not recommend this Razor.
customer_reviews.author: Cbe

customer_reviews.title: A hit with my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this scooter for my 9 year old grandson's birthday. It arrived on time, securely packaged, and was partially assembled. It was very easy to put handlebars on and the tool we needed was enclosed. We charged the battery before giving to him and he rode for a good while before taking it home and it still had plenty of battery life. We are well pleased with this scooter, and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: donna t

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life but takes quite a few hours to recharge. It is an extremely bumpy ride so my son says he prefers smooth, paved surfaces. He has been enjoying a daily ride out in the neighborhood since receiving this for his birthday. The weight limit is 120 lbs so a bigger child will outgrow this quickly. So far it's holding up, but did have a piece broken upon arrival from not being protected well enough around the handlebars. It's also really hard to push once the battery dies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too fast for kids...
customer_reviews.text: The scooter itself was fine, great quality. But, the market to kids/age is not accurate. This scooter moves very fast! And I mean, very fast. As soon as the ignition button is pressed, it shoots off and my child just tried to hang on and not crash. Very dangerous... This should definitely be more for order kids or teens, but then the handle would be too short.
customer_reviews.author: TN mom reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you have any slopes in your area - works only on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my seven-year-old. First several times, the scooter worked fine. However, after about two months, using it less than ten times, my daughter took it to a park that has a bit of an incline (as we live in Los Angeles County we have hills). When going up a slope, the scooter stops working, and the throttle dies. When I contacted the warranty department, they informed me that the scooter only works on a flat surface. Evidently, this disclaimer is buried somewhere (page 7 of the instruction manual) and not anywhere in their marketing material. If you live anywhere with a few slopes, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Han

customer_reviews.title: The scooter ran great for maybe six months
customer_reviews.text: The scooter ran great for maybe six months, then the battery stopped working properly. I put it to charge and five minutes into riding it it loses power. Not sure what to do. I guess maybe buy a new battery for it, but I don’t know which battery and from where to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Gianina A Koval

customer_reviews.title: Never expected it to be this nice
customer_reviews.text: My 55 lb son can ride this thing for almost 2 hours on a charge (not continuous, but still a lot of time under power); way more than advertised. It goes fast enough, but not crazy-fast. It takes him up and down hills at the same speed, which is cool. It seems very stable and has taken some "wipe outs" with nothing more than a couple scratches. The tiny kickstand is really handy. It charges very fast too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are not always kind to their toys and this has lasted for quite sometime with no repairs needed. We’ve taken it uphill on a 3 mile walk and it lasted the entire time. Great battery life and my son weighs 97pds. We also got one for our 5 year old daughter and she loves it although we are aware she’s too young for the box recommendations, she rides it like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: David Walters

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The unit was a Christmas gift. It states in the paperwork to immediately charge for at least 12 hours, which we did. It also states to keep the battery from low temperatures. How do they ship it in the winter time and keep this from happening. I guess maybe this is why the battery only worked for one push of the button and then stopped working. I will be returning the unit and getting a refund so we can get a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: bsnydersvc

customer_reviews.title: Slow and dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: Either I bought something different than the other reviewers or we have a lemon. This scooter is a major disappointment. My 9-year old goes maybe a max of 6mph on it -- he's faster with his push scooter. And when he hits a hill it usually won't get him up it, which is a no-go in my neighborhood. It also seems to lose even more battery life, and definitely does NOT last more than half an hour. I think we'll be returning this one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ephie Risho

customer_reviews.title: The hit of Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: The hit of Christmas! My 8 year old was able to jump right in it as santa had it charged already (after assembling some of it which he said was super easy). The battery lasted longer than his stamina which is saying a lot! Since he is an ball of energy. He lives not having to push it up a hill like his old one and to him it is super fast. He weighs about 60# so it is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great little scooter. I am 180 pounds and I did a “quality assurance” check before giving it to my 6 year old son. I rode this thing all around the neighborhood, caught some pretty good stares as well as a few laughs. The little razor chugged along surprisingly well at its top speed slowing only for increases in incline. I aimed to kill the battery so I could give it a good recharge, however, I rode that thing for about 50 min and it never showed signs of quitting. I got bored and my back hurt from crouching to reach the bars (I’m 5’9”). Impressed with the quality. Nice work, razor.
customer_reviews.author: Manda10210

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this scooter for my son's 6th birthday. Thought he might be a little young but he caught on really quickly! It's stable and sturdy, he hasn't had one accident with it. The speed is great - fast enough to feel thrilling, but slow enough that he can control it. Battery life is good enough for me to get a good jog in on the trail while he rides it (haven't ridden it until the battery is completely drained so I couldn't say exactly how long it lasts). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Durant

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for my son. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my 7 year old and he loves it. Definitely sturdy enough, battery life is perfect, and it’s pretty fast so make sure they keep their helmets on. Was a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: budicegirl247

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It is tricky with charging and the light never changes color like it is suppose to. My 4 yr old grandson loves it. He is not the average child when it comes to doing things like this. He gets better with it all the time. I also bought a good helmet and pad sets to protect him. I keep my grass low and he rides it in the grass after he gets it started on cement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE these scooters!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment my kids (10 and 14) opened these scooters, they have not stopped playing with them. They love them. One of the best presents I've ever given them. Very sturdy, easy to use, can go long distances and up hills. They have to charge the battery after every use is the only downside. Otherwise, very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, the battery stopped working after using less than a dozen times, and now it won’t turn on period... totally unacceptable.. can’t return, outside of the amazon window and razor warranty is 90 days which is a joke...
customer_reviews.author: Trix

customer_reviews.title: It outlasts my kid!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son on Christmas of 2019 and he loves it. We take it everywhere, its easy to pack away and even take with us to the park or a friends house. The best part so far is that the battery has out lasted my son each time he has ridden it. When he comes in i always ask, "Did it die?" and the answer is always "No, just done riding for today." This thing is great!! I'm thinking of getting a big kid version and hitting the town with my son, might even start a scooter gang.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the scooter.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty anxious about buying this with some older reviews talking about lack of sturdiness, mileage etc but I gave it a try for my son, and I very happy with the product. It's pretty good value for the price too. The scooter looks cool, good balance, has a broad standing space and we tried running it for around 5 miles in full charge and it worked too. So far I am satisfied. I hope that the scooter stands the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: TIJIN GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this, Walmart sells one like it but it has less battery life. Our 7-year-old I think has only killed the battery one time, it lasts a lot longer than I feel like it says. It is pretty fast for our son, maybe because he's a tall, skinny, little guy. He was nervous because it went faster than we expected but he now loves it. It does ride a little rough that would be my only complaint. I think it is a good buy. I wouldn't buy from Walmart, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Should have a speed option
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 7 years old son who is very afraid of this scooter because of the rapid speed it takes off with, when he push the button. I recommend that this scooter should have a speed control so that children can gradually get accustom as they select the speed limit. It looks and feels sturdy and was very easy to assemble. I cannot give comment on the battery life seen that he have not driven it for an extended time.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: SPEED CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to control the speed. There is a button, pushing it scooter rides. And it starts to go very abruptly, and very fast. This is dangerous. I can’t do the speed faster or slower, the scooter either goes very fast or does not go. I bought my son, but he can’t ride it. I am very sad😫
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: My 7 y/o son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son got this for Christmas and absolutely loves it. He rides it back and forth from home to my sister's house who lives 5 houses down, all the time. I can't seem to get the thing tightened enough that keeps the handle bars straight is my only complaint, so they get unaligned when he turns the handlebars too far sometimes. But I also haven't tried tightening them again since we assembled it, I thought I had it pretty tight when we put it together but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a growing tween.
customer_reviews.text: It was too small for my Growing tween. I returned it And purchased another brand adult size for him to have space to grow into. Probably best for small younger children due to short footbed and short handlebar height.
customer_reviews.author: kstn's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great motorized scooter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids Christmas presents and 10 months later still going strong. Battery life is good, even when they forget to turn it off. (which is often)
customer_reviews.author: Vance Holiday

customer_reviews.title: A well made product
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived securely packed and it was incredibly easy to assemble (less than five minutes). I immediately started charging it and it was ready for my child to arrive sixteen hours later. It hasn't been ridden enough to speak about the batter life. Overall, the scooter is well made but it would difficult to use if you run out of charge and need to get it back.
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 9 year old, 70lbs son last Christmas. It’s still going strong. He loves it. It does go pretty fast(I tried it and it scared me) lol. It holds a charge well. You do need to push off once turned on the get it going.... my son would always forget that at first and be upset thinking it was broke. He’s got the hang of it now. We would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: this was a Christmas gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: And he LOVES IT. So far, it's been working great. Not sure what battery life is -- actually my daughter told me but I forgot. Sorry. However, it is very, very zippy. Easy to use. IT's kinda heavy but I expected that. So far, everyone is very happy with it. My 8 year old grandson sets up the charging and again, it's very very easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moro

customer_reviews.title: No real speed control, battery lasts a pretty long time
customer_reviews.text: My son is having difficulty learning to use this as there's no easing into it you hit the button and it immediately jumps up to the 10 miles an hour I really wish that it had some speed control for him so it wasn't so jolting. I'm 115 pounds so I tried it and once he gets used to it he will love it im sure. I do see why it startles him though.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults alike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 and very coordinated and does great riding this scooter. It does take a little getting used to bc of how powerful the motor is when you initially press the button, but once you get the hang of it you’ll really enjoy the ease of the ride. I highly recommend for kids 7+ my 5 yr old isnt quite ready to play with it just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Somehow for us the battery never runs out however we know to charge it after each use! Great for boys and girls. I purchased for my daughter since she doesn’t like pink and it’s great for a walk or play time.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Rico

customer_reviews.title: E100 wheels are better
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s pretty good, but compared to the E100 that my other child has, this one isn’t near as stable/sturdy because the front wheel is so small and it just feels so loose - very different feel when comparing the two. I’d recommend the E100 for sure, if you’re going to get an electric scooter. This one will be fine though.
customer_reviews.author: amberk

customer_reviews.title: My kids love the scooter
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool little scooter for the kids it charges well and has a great battery life decent weight Capacity and haven’t had a problem with it breaking down and then using it for years and my kids are still having fun with it would recommend this scooter to anyone looking for something electric for your kids at a good price
customer_reviews.author: ladynla78

customer_reviews.title: Go that way >>>
customer_reviews.text: Well, the speed is good for my 10 year old son, but he says it wobbles too much and it's extremely heavy. The bottom part is so low he has to be extra careful with the littlest crack or else he'll go flying. Thanks to the Razor helmet I bought him that saved him from a skull fracture!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Bronx Boss Killa

customer_reviews.title: Safety first good for adult not for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Safety first.. not very good for kids under 18. Very useful for adult I am 42 years old and I love using it for short distances instead of using car but I was about to be hit by the bus today because I was enjoying the ride thinking the road was empty but the bus just came out fast and I was like 1 inch away to be hit but Thanks to Allah He saved me and able to write this review. Be careful and try to follow the traffic lights no matter what, safety first.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is 7 loves this. Wish it lasted a little longer but he has a blast on it. Wouldnt buy for anyone under 5 and it goes fast enough we make him wear knee and elbow pads and helmet
customer_reviews.author: Crexer

customer_reviews.title: Not very good, stiff back tire result in clunky ride and not good battery.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good at all! I just bought this and had to replace the battery after a month. The back tire is not soft at all for the sidewalk. Very clunky when my son is riding it. And the motor engagement mechanism is already making noises and starts to disagage sooner then when we first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Very HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Let’s see here’s the issue it’s heavy as heck and u can’t push it or drag it when battery dies so no mom is gonna like this unless she is a weight lifting Connoisseur. I would love this if that issue would disappear because I’m stuck with this heavy crazy non pushable scooter when the battery dies making this a very hard item to want to use .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grandjoys are outside playing everyday now!
customer_reviews.text: Got three for my grandjoys for Christmas. Took them out of the box and charged them so they were ready to go. They played on them till the battery died and have been on them every day since. It’s good to see them playing outside. They are 6-9 years old and will get many years use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate
customer_reviews.text: Well this scooter worked for the first 8 rides. Now it shuts down in the first 3 minutes of riding. Just stops. I would love to return it for a full refund. My grandchildren are so sad, now what to do?
customer_reviews.author: Jdcurtin

customer_reviews.title: I tested it with my 215 lbs and it held up
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun. I bought two, one for my 5 year old Grandson and the other for my wife. I know it has a weight limit but I had to try it out and it handled my 215 lbs with ease on a flat surface. Kickstand is nice too. Easy to ride and brake works good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids...Wish it hand an auto off feature.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 7 year old son. He loves it. Battery life is long, and have had few issues. Minor design flaw, in that the battery doesnt have an auto shut off. You MUST turn the scooter off after each use. If not, the battery will completely drain, and will not hold a charge. A $40 learning lesson, but simple replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: well built; good for the money; kids are happy with it after 2 months of use; wish it was a little more sturdy but overall it is good.
customer_reviews.author: iajarmeh

customer_reviews.title: It was easy for my 7 year-old grandson to learn and he ...
customer_reviews.text: It took quite a while to charge but once that was accomplished the charge held for a long time. It was easy for my 7 year-old grandson to learn and he loves riding it. Much easier to learn than a overboard and I believe it goes faster. It was a good price and I feel it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Roos

customer_reviews.title: Speed racer
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift, best money spent. Ones as Walmart sell for double the price. Kids rode them for several days before having to recharge them.
customer_reviews.author: re7re19

customer_reviews.title: Christmas 2 boys
customer_reviews.text: My grandson, 27 years old he help me take it out of the box, he told me, “grandma, this is heavy, easy to assemble”. I bought for Christmas. we did charge one, used it, absolutely great. very happy with this purchase can’t wait to see their faces at Christmas. The boys are going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: velia garcia

customer_reviews.title: Save your money - loses charge and stops working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two in April and one is already not charging by August. 90 day warranty is over. Really disappointed and kicking myself for not trusting the reviews. DO NOT BUY!!! The other one is super slow like it’s not ever fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: KetoBeauties

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My 8 year old zips around on this thing like a breeze! He said it's the best birthday present he's gotten in his whole life! Mission accomplished !
customer_reviews.author: Shellemeno

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but battery life dropped
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my kids and they love it. Unfortunately, one of them started to lose its battery efficiency only in two months. I think it shouldn’t be that way. But it is a great price for the fun my kids are having:)
customer_reviews.author: Ally Walker

customer_reviews.title: Trash battery
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t even charge. Don’t bother. I am so disappointed in this razor we were so excited to take our son out on it. ChArged it for 12 hours wouldn’t go at all. Left it to charge for the additional 12 just in case it needed the full 24hrs and still a big fat nothing. Nothing. For such a popular name brand this was trash. I should have trusted the reviews and went with a different company and paid more money. Razor your have become another cheaply made company. Wasted TIME
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: It quit working after a little over a month.. Luckily I can still return it, I did buy a used one and never had issues in the past. I’m not sure if that’s why it stopped working or why.. the scooter still turns on, but does not move anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Fun but very fast
customer_reviews.text: It's very fast The handle bars is none adjustable Theres no speed setting unfortunately Easy to charge and use
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Good Times
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old loves it. Rides to school and back - only once has the battery died. Came on time and as described. The wheels "sound" a little plastic/cheap to me - especially when he hits a bump, but it doesn't affect the ride
customer_reviews.author: AnnieDB

customer_reviews.title: It Came Very Muddy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though specified it was a used product as soon as it came I wrapped it up and put under the Christmas tree for my son as soon as he open it Christmas Day, he knew it had been returned and used by someone else because it was very muddy Amazon worker who processed for resell could have at least scrapped the thick mud off it very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Terrance cary

customer_reviews.title: Fun times ahead!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old LOVES his new scooter. Easy to assemble and we love that it has the extra battery life. 80 minutes compared to 40 on most other scooters. Easy to ride and goes faster than you think it would. Helmet is needed for sure. Only downfall is front handlebars can't be raised. Our 8 year old is tall but it's still comfortable for him and sure doesn't inhibit him riding at all. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Jeffcote

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy a product from Razor
customer_reviews.text: Customer support from this company (Razor) is awful. Everything sent w the scooter states to contact Razor directly with problems. Three attempts by phone and the call is constantly breaking up so impossible to address with a rep. Online support is useless. Three attempts to submit a problem and the online form does not go through to Razor. Amazon is great. They are handling a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Butkowski

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Easy to Ride, and Battery Last a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: This was soooooo easy to assemble it was scary. I had the Scooter unpacked and put together in less than 15 minutes. A little bit of a Rough Ride for me, but my 9 year old LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.author: MDavis7000

customer_reviews.title: Retuned packaging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter’s birthday which is tomorrow. I received it today. By looking at the box, I am very disappointed because it is obvious the item was previously retuned. You can see where tape was removed removing some up the box cover. I am praying it is ok and won’t need to be retuned. I’ll do an update tomorrow once it’s been put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybee

customer_reviews.title: Company knowingly sent bad product - previously returned
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed in product. REceived box and you could tell it had previously been opened and returned. Was hoping for the best, but day after Christmas my son tried it and the scooter electric motor does not work. Very crummy on behalf of company sending a product that they probably knew did not work. Thanks for a dissapointing gift!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Rossi

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase, my son (age 6) loves it. Took him a few days to get used to it since it jumps to full speed when you press the go button. Bought a second one for my brother (age 10) and he loves it as well. Awsome product 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it....when it works.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son for Christmas this past year. Since then, we've had to take it to a scooter store THREE times to be repaired and have parts replaced, because it continues to stop working. We have been on the phone with Razor many times. It would be nice if they sent a replacement instead of continually replacing parts. My poor son just wants to ride his scooter around the neighborhood with his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old son for christmas. He loves it. We wish it went a little faster or at least had a speed ajustment. But it doesnt. None the less, he is happy. So we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it wish the handles were adjustable tho
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and goes plenty fast for my 10 year old daughter. She is short but the handles are still a little low for her. I wish they were adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Mm3rica

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7 or 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My kid zooms up and down the driveway or the street on this, it’s teaching him balance, and if he’ll just learn how to use the brakes instead of his feet, we’ll be golden!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed, resonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well designed, and built. It was easy to assemble, and good directions. Only time will tell how it will hold up to a 9 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: ebb

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves it. He is about 60 pounds. The hub tire seems to be made of hard plastic instead of rubber so we'll see how that works out over time but for the price I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 10 and 8 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old, he loved it so much that I ended up getting another for my 8 year old two weeks later. They love cruising around our very hilly neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, quality scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but sturdy. Great quality for my son. Took a minute to realize he has to get it moving before he engages the engine to get it to go automatically. This is actually safer, not just a jolt start. Easily started and stopped and so far very safe. So far, battery life is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anne R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Fun, perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y/o loves this! Always wear protection! Kind of dangerous, but it's fun. I weight around 170 and it holds fine, not for a long time, though.
customer_reviews.author: UnchargedCandy

customer_reviews.title: not the recommended 12. Light was green about 30 minutes after ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth $100. Charges it for 5 hours, not the recommended 12. Light was green about 30 minutes after I plugged it in but we waited as long as we could lol. Easy to put together. Plenty fast for my small 7 yr old. Battery is excellent first run time was over 90 minutes. Excellent product great value highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SSWA39

customer_reviews.title: really good scooter
customer_reviews.text: my 13 year old daughter was getting to big for her old scooter. when we got this scooter she loved it this scooter, it goes way faster than a normal scooter it goes up to 10 miles per hour it holds up to 120 lbs, all you need to do is kick and hold the button to get you going
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Frongner

customer_reviews.title: Great little electric scooter.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered 2 for our grandsons for Christmas. They loved them so much I ordered one for our house. Made well and rides really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: sandal

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last
customer_reviews.text: We must have gotten a defective one. After several hours of charging, the light changed from red to green so my daughter decided to try it. The battery lasted about 4 minutes, and would not charge after that first use. Will be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Dani F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter!!! My kid absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 6 years old and he absolutely loves it. He picked it himself for his birthday gift back in July and no regrets. He learned very quick how to control it and now is speeding in the park every single weekend. Definitely will recommend to everyone, great for kids 5-8 years old I would say
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a tall 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy. Got it for my 6 year old son. He is still learning to balance on it. It is durable and will be useful for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A day late but all come to me in one piece. My Grandson loves it 💙 and it's fast moving. Several rides without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Brown-Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Safety! Wear google, due to its fast!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4yr old and 6yr old.. they loved it, probably one of the best $100 we've spent on.. this is something we decided to get for our friends kids bdayyy gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle mama

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one that I have gotten and it's something wrong with the back wheel he rode it once and haven't rode it again cause the back wheel isn't working properly. I need to return it asap...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handlebars loosen too easily
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how long the battery lasts. It was disappointing to have to wait 12 hours for the initial charge. The scooter seems durable but if using on asphalt, like in a subdivision, it's a let down in the fact that the handlebars loosen out of alignment and have to continually be adjusted. I have tightened as tight as I can and they still loosen up. Best suited for smooth concrete surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 8 year old son. He loves it and picked up on it within minutes and hasn’t had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scooter for my 7 year old daughter. She loves her scooter. It was very easy to set up. The battery life is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Miss GT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Such a good little scooter my sons favorite thing to do outside now!!!!! He loves it and says “ it’s so fast dad”
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Battery life is good. A little to small for my 12yr old but she's pretty tall for her age (5'6)
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Gray

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCOOTER! BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this electric scooter, when we first got it I was riding every where. But then like after 2 weeks, I went to ride it. I pushed The button, but it Didn’t work. and I’m very frustrated and sad. And still wondering how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarom Ballantyne

customer_reviews.title: Very good scooter for the value
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. Battery life is way longer than other similar scooters. It’s supper sturdy and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Scooter goes so slow, you can’t even keep it upright. Charged for 12 hours...same. Charged for 18 hours...same. Charged 2 days...same. I purchased it in october for Christmas. Since we didn’t open it until December, we had missed the return window. This item will collect dust in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: This heavy thing been banged around and all still holding up strong !!!! Great buy I did originally buy for my 6 year old but it was to much for him my 10 year old loves it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: a

product_meta.title: Razor Power Core E90 Electric Scooter
feature_bullets: Hand-operated front brake and All-steel frame and fork
Urethane front wheel, airless rear wheel and retractable kick stand
75% more ride time than similar electric scooters
